title: What are the portions for 1st sem and where to find em?

comments.body:
I would suggest to wait and see it with your batchmates

The portions might be different from your seniors
In the mean time is it better to learn C++ or python for 1st year?

Python for sure regardless of which cycle you belong to in first sem, and c in second sem.
